CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to CrimsonLink?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} CrimsonLink in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing CrimsonLink relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: CrimsonLink is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Online relative to EchoWave?
SRP.A: Starburst Online is {below} EchoWave in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {NovaStream}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total platform traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst Online}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Online's minimum Platform Traffic is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is OracleFeed's minimum Platform Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: OracleFeed's minimum Platform Traffic is in {1984}.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 1993 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 1993 was {lower} than in 2002.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 1975 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 1975 was {lower} than in 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Platform Traffic in 1995 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total platform traffic in 1995 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 2000, was the average total Platform Traffic higher or lower than between 1981 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total platform traffic between 1977 and 2000 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1985.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {NovaStream} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did EchoWave and Luminara first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: EchoWave and Luminara first exchanged leading positions in {1977}.
